analysis.description:
Reentrancy in EtheremonPayment.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#303-336):
	External calls:
	- (class.classId,class.price,class.returnPrice,class.total,class.catchable) = data.getMonsterClass(_classId) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#311-315)
	- data.getMonsterDexSize(_trainer) > maxDexSize (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#320-322)
	- objId = data.addMonsterObj(_classId,_trainer,_name) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#323-324)
	- value = getRandom(STAT_MAX,uint8(i),lastHunter) + data.getElementInArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#328-332)
	- data.addElementToArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#332)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastHunter (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#332)
class in EtheremonPayment.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#310-311) is a local variable never initialiazed

EtheremonPayment.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#263-268) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_sendTo,_amount) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#268)

EtheremonPayment.giveBattleBonus (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#287-293) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_trainer,_amount) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#291-292)

EtheremonPayment.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#303-336) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-data.addElementToArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#332)

EtheremonPayment.catchMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- value = getRandom(STAT_MAX,uint8(i),lastHunter) + data.getElementInArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#328-332)

EtheremonPayment.catchMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.addElementToArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#332)

EtheremonDataBase.totalClass should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#117)
EtheremonDataBase.totalMonster should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeb0058ce60d753004b0efa2164f88b2a5b528e7d.sol#117)
